annotation.message: An operand identifier [goal] is hiding another identifier of the same name.

a:s.a:s: // Returns Date from the first Goal target that has a due date. define fluent function dueDate(goal Goal):
// TODO if due is Duration, add that quantity to startDate
// Returns a list of goal domain Observations that this Goal addresses. define fluent function goalDomainObservations(goal Goal):

/* * General FHIR data helpers. */
define fluent function getId(uri String):
// Returns a list of PCO Goals that are included in this CarePlan. define fluent function pcoGoals(carePlan CarePlan):
// A "PCO Goal" is any FHIR Goal that has a category in "PCO Categories" define "PCO Goals":
// All observations containing a Goal Attainment Scaling (GAS) score. define "GAS Observations":
// All FHIR Goals for this patient. Useful for verifying subset matched by "PCO Goals". define "All Goals":

a:t.name: description
a:t.value: Returns any extensions defined on the given resource with the specified url.

a:t.name: comment
a:t.value: NOTE: Extensions are not the preferred approach, but are used as a way to access content that is defined by extensions but not yet surfaced in the CQL model info.

a:s.a:s: // A "GAS Goal" is any FHIR Goal that includes GAS extensions define "GAS Goals":
// All FHIR CarePlan resources for this patient. Useful for verifying subset matched by "PCO Care Plans". define "All Care Plans":
// A "PCO CarePlan" is any FHIR CarePlan that includes a PCO Goal define "PCO Care Plans":
// Returns a collection of Observations with a caregiver's follow-up GAS score. define "GAS Caregiver Follow-Up Scores":
// Returns a list of Observations that this Goal addresses. define fluent function addressesObservations(goal Goal):
// Returns a list of Goals that address this Observation define fluent function addressedByGoals(obs Observation):

a:t.name: description
a:t.value: Returns the single extension (if present) on the given resource with the specified url.

a:t.name: comment
a:t.value: This function uses singleton from to ensure that a run-time exception is thrown if there is more than one extension on the given resource with the specified url.
